Increasing The LIFE Stat Does Not Increase Lifespan
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Hoaxes, Myths and Pranks!: Increasing The LIFE Stat Does Not Increase Lifespan
By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, January 2, 2001 - 06:07 pm:

This is a bit of wishful thinking that dates back to the MR1 days, and seems to keep popping up. (With help from some unscrupulous webmasters...) Increasing the monsters' LIFE stat does nothing for lifespan, it's simply their life-bar in battle.

By Gunburn on Sunday, January 7, 2001 - 02:47 pm:

Really? Man did I waste a lot of time trying to get old monsters to level up in Life. Well at least i know now.

By torey_luvullo on Sunday, January 7, 2001 - 09:43 pm:

well, life[the category] is not completely useless, gunburn...besides helping in battle, it also gets you further on expeditions - sometimes, it gets you invited! it just doesnt make you live longer.
